name: Willemite
desc: Willemite is a zinc silicate mineral (Zn2SiO4) and a minor ore of zinc. It is highly fluorescent (green) under shortwave ultraviolet light. It occurs in all different colors in daylight, in fibrous masses, solid brown masses ("troostite"), and apple green gemmy masses.

images.alt: Willemite 2 w- franklinite zinc orthosilicate Franklin Sussex County New Jersey 1901.jpg
